info.description: ccf-grlc: Useful SPARQL queries for HRA work + API via grlc.io
info.title: ccf-grlc

get.description:
```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts

PREFIX hint: <http://www.bigdata.com/queryHints#> 
PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
  	a ?ftu_iri ;
  	ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
    ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
    ccf:image_file [
      ccf:file_format ?format ;
      ccf:file_url ?image_url
    ] .
  BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
  
  ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
  ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
  ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

  BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
  FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
}

```

```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl>
PREFIX pcl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/pcl.owl>
PREFIX uberon_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.owl>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon/redundant>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl/redundant>
FROM NAMED HRA:
WHERE {
  GRAPH HRA: {
    ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
      a ?ftu_iri ;
      ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
      ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
      ccf:image_file [
        ccf:file_format ?format ;
        ccf:file_url ?image_url
      ] .
    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
    
    ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
    ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
    ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
    FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
  }

  ?parent_as part_of: ?organ_iri .
  ?ftu_iri part_of:* ?parent_as .
  ?ftu_part_iri overlaps:|part_of:+ ?ftu_iri .

  OPTIONAL {
    ?other_as part_of: ?organ_iri .
    ?ftu_part_iri overlaps:|part_of:+ ?other_as .
    FILTER(?other_as != ?organ_iri && ?other_as != ?ftu_iri && ?other_as != ?parent_as)
  }
  FILTER(!BOUND(?other_as))
}
ORDER BY ?ftu_digital_object

```
get.summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu

get.description:
```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu (via ASCT+B relationships)

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl>
PREFIX pcl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/pcl.owl>
PREFIX uberon_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.owl>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  {
    ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
      a ?ftu_iri ;
      ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
      ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
      ccf:image_file [
        ccf:file_format ?format ;
        ccf:file_url ?image_url
      ] .
    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
    
    ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
    ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
    ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
    FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
  }

  ?parent_as ccf:ccf_part_of ?organ_iri .
  ?ftu_iri ccf:ccf_part_of* ?parent_as .
  ?ftu_part_iri ccf:ccf_located_in|ccf:ccf_part_of+ ?ftu_iri .

  OPTIONAL {
    ?other_as ccf:ccf_part_of ?organ_iri .
    ?ftu_part_iri ccf:ccf_located_in|ccf:ccf_part_of+ ?other_as .
    FILTER(?other_as != ?organ_iri && ?other_as != ?ftu_iri && ?other_as != ?parent_as)
  }
  FILTER(!BOUND(?other_as))
}
ORDER BY ?ftu_digital_object

```
get.summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu (via ASCT+B relationships)

get.description:
```
#+ summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu (via ASCT+B and OBO relationships)

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX obo: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/cl.owl>
PREFIX pcl_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/pcl.owl>
PREFIX uberon_owl: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/uberon.owl>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ_id ?ftu_digital_object ?image_url ?organ_label ?ftu_label ?ftu_part_label ?organ_iri ?ftu_iri ?ftu_part_iri
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon/redundant>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl/redundant>
FROM HRA:
FROM NAMED HRA:
WHERE {
  # Find all FTU Illustrations and their parts
  GRAPH HRA: {
    ?ftu_illustration a ccf:FtuIllustration ;
      a ?ftu_iri ;
      ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ_iri ;
      ccf:illustration_node [ a ?ftu_part_iri ] ;
      ccf:image_file [
        ccf:file_format ?format ;
        ccf:file_url ?image_url
      ] .
    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?ftu_illustration), "#primary", "")) as ?ftu_digital_object)
    
    ?ftu_part_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_part_label .
    ?ftu_iri rdfs:label ?ftu_label .
    ?organ_iri rdfs:label ?organ_label .

    BIND(IRI(REPLACE(STR(?organ_iri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:')) as ?organ_id)
    FILTER(?format = "image/png") # or "image/svg+xml"
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_iri), STR(obo:)))
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?ftu_part_iri), STR(obo:)))
  }

  # The FTU is part of an organ either directly or through other AS
  ?parent_as ccf:ccf_part_of|part_of: ?organ_iri .
  ?ftu_iri ccf:ccf_part_of|part_of:* ?parent_as .

  # An FTU Part (Cell or AS) is connected to an FTU either directly or through other AS
  ?ftu_part_iri ccf:ccf_located_in|ccf:ccf_part_of|overlaps:|part_of:+ ?ftu_iri .

  OPTIONAL {
    ?other_as ccf:ccf_part_of|part_of: ?organ_iri .
    ?ftu_part_iri ccf:ccf_located_in|ccf:ccf_part_of|overlaps:|part_of:+ ?other_as .
    FILTER(?other_as != ?organ_iri && ?other_as != ?ftu_iri && ?other_as != ?parent_as)
  }
  FILTER(!BOUND(?other_as))
}
ORDER BY ?ftu_digital_object

```
get.summary: get 2D FTU images and parts that are unique to the ftu (via ASCT+B and OBO relationships)
Every digital object pushed to lod.humanatlas.io

get.description:
Count of 3D Anatomical Structures

```
#+ summary: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures
#+ description: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT (COUNT(?as3d) as ?as_count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  SELECT DISTINCT ?as3d WHERE {
    ?as3d ccf:has_reference_organ ?y .
    FILTER(!CONTAINS(STR(?y), '/united-'))
  }
}

```

```
#+ summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type

```
get.summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Unique AS, CT, and B across all HRA versions

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type
```
get.summary: Unique AS, CT, and B across all HRA versions

get.description:
Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Biomarker trios for structures part of it

```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and Biomarker trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Biomarker trios for structures part of it

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra-api>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?biomarker_label ?as ?ct ?biomarker
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  # VALUES (?_location_iri) {
  #   (<http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113>)
  # }

  # Get AS of interest
  ?as ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?as rdfs:label ?as_label .

  # Lookup CT + B for the AS via ASCT+B tables
  # [] a ccf:AsctbRecord ;
  #   ccf:anatomical_structure [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?as 
  #   ];
  #   ccf:cell_type [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?ct 
  #   ];
  #   ccf:biomarker_marker [
  #     ccf:source_concept ?biomarker 
  #   ] .

  # Alternative that only looks up CT+B specifically assigned to that AS, does not include children
  [] a ccf:CellMarkerDescriptor ;
    ccf:primary_anatomical_structure ?as ;
    ccf:primary_cell_type ?ct ;
    ccf:biomarker ?biomarker .

  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?biomarker rdfs:label ?biomarker_label .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Biomarker trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

get.description:
Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Gene trios for structures part of it

```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and Gene trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of AS, CT, and Gene trios for structures part of it

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra-api>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?gene_symbol ?as ?ct ?gene
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  # Get AS of interest
  ?as ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?as rdfs:label ?as_label .

  # Lookup CT + B for the AS via ASCT+B tables
  [] a ccf:AsctbRecord ;
    ccf:anatomical_structure [
      ccf:source_concept ?as 
    ];
    ccf:cell_type [
      ccf:source_concept ?ct 
    ];
    ccf:gene_marker [
      ccf:source_concept ?gene 
    ] .

  # Alternative that only looks up CT+B specifically assigned to that AS, does not include children
  # [] a ccf:CellMarkerDescriptor ;
  #   ccf:primary_anatomical_structure ?as ;
  #   ccf:primary_cell_type ?ct ;
  #   ccf:biomarker ?gene .

  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?gene rdfs:label ?gene_symbol .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Gene trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: AS, CT, and Protein trios by AS located in a given anatomical structure

get.description:
All anatomical structures part of a given anatomical structure, including itself

```
#+ summary: All AS part of a given AS
#+ description: All anatomical structures part of a given anatomical structure, including itself

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX part_of: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/BFO_0000050>
PREFIX UBERON: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/uberon>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?part_iri ?part_label
FROM UBERON:
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?part_iri ccf:ccf_part_of*|part_of:* ?_location_iri .
  ?part_iri rdfs:label ?part_label .
}
ORDER BY ?part_iri

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: All AS part of a given AS

get.description:
Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

```
#+ summary: AS per Ref. Organ
#+ description: Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX FMA: <http://purl.org/sig/ont/fma/fma>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT
  ?organ
  ?sex
  (COUNT(?structure) AS ?as_count)
  (SAMPLE(?uberon_id) as ?uberon_id)
  (REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), '#primary', '') as ?url)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?structure ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:representation_of ?organIri ;
    ccf:organ_owner_sex ?sex .
  
  ?organIri ccf:ccf_pref_label ?organ_label .

  BIND(LCASE(?organ_label) as ?organ)
  BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?organIri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:'), STR(FMA:), 'FMA:') as ?uberon_id)
}
GROUP BY ?refOrgan ?organ ?sex
ORDER BY ?organ ?sex

```

```
#+ summary: AS, CT, and BM in a given ASCT+B Table

#+ defaults:
#+   - asctb: https://purl.humanatlas.io/asct-b/lymph-node

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_label ?ct_label ?bm_label ?as ?ct ?bm ?bmType
WHERE {
  GRAPH ?_asctb_iri {
    ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?as . # Get cell types located in an anatomical structure

    # Find all sets of biomarkers that characterize a cell type
    ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
      owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
      owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bmSetId ]] .
    ?bmSetId rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
      owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
      owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
    ] .

    # Get biomarker type
    ?bm ccf:ccf_biomarker_type ?bmType .

    ?as ccf:ccf_pref_label ?as_label .
    ?ct ccf:ccf_pref_label ?ct_label .
    ?bm ccf:ccf_pref_label ?bm_label .
  }
}
ORDER BY ?as_label

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_asctb_iri in the original query
parameters.name: asctb

get.summary: AS, CT, and BM in a given ASCT+B Table

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Biomarkers located in AS

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as ?bm
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?as .

  ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
  	owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
  	owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
  ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
  	owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
  ] .
}

```

```
#+ summary: All unique bibliography entries in DOs

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref
FROM LOD:
WHERE {
  [] a dcat:Dataset ; dct:description ?description .
  BIND(REPLACE(STRAFTER(?description, 'Bibliography:**'), "^\\s+|\\s+$", "") as ?ref)
  FILTER(?ref != "")
}
ORDER BY ?ref

```
get.summary: All unique bibliography entries in DOs
Every digital object and their citations

get.description:
```
#+ summary: Digital objects counts in the latest HRA release

PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT ?type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?digitalObject)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  HRA: prov:hadMember ?digitalObject .
  BIND(STRBEFORE(REPLACE(STR(?digitalObject), 'https://purl.humanatlas.io/', ''), '/') as ?type)
}
GROUP BY ?type
ORDER BY ?type

```
get.summary: Digital objects counts in the latest HRA release

get.description:
```
#+ summary: All unique references in DOs

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX dcat: <http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#>
PREFIX dct: <http://purl.org/dc/terms/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX LOD: <https://lod.humanatlas.io>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref
FROM LOD:
WHERE {
  [] a dcat:Dataset ; dct:references ?ref .
}
ORDER BY ?ref

```

```
#+ summary: ensembl ids in HRA

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX dbxref: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#hasDbXref>
PREFIX oboInOwl: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?gene_symbol ?hgnc_id ?ensembl_id
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?gene dbxref: ?ensembl_id ;
        oboInOwl:id ?hgnc_id ;
        rdfs:label ?gene_symbol .
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(?ensembl_id, 'ENSG'))
}
ORDER BY ?gene_symbol

```

```
#+ summary: A lookup table from Ensembl ID to gene name and HGNC ID

PREFIX hgnc: <http://purl.bioontology.org/ontology/HGNC/>
PREFIX hgncId: <http://identifiers.org/hgnc/>
PREFIX oboInOwl: <http://www.geneontology.org/formats/oboInOwl#>
PREFIX HGNC: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/hgnc>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ensemble ?gene_name ?hgnc
FROM HGNC:
WHERE
{
  ?hgnc_id oboInOwl:hasDbXref ?ensemble ;
          hgnc:symbol ?gene_name .
  BIND(REPLACE(STR(?hgnc_id), STR(hgncId:), 'HGNC:') as ?hgnc)
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(?ensemble, 'ENS'))
}
ORDER BY ?ensemble

```
get.summary: A lookup table from Ensembl ID to gene name and HGNC ID

get.description:
```
#+ summary: HRA-HPO shared Uberon and CL terms

PREFIX prov: <http://www.w3.org/ns/prov#>
PREFIX schema: <http://schema.org/>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX HPO: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/hp>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?term ?term_label
WHERE {
  GRAPH HRA: {
    ?term rdfs:label ?term_label .
  }
  GRAPH HPO: {
    ?term rdfs:label ?term_label .
  }
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?term), STR(UBERON:)) || STRSTARTS(STR(?term), STR(CL:)))
}
ORDER BY ?term

```
get.summary: HRA-HPO shared Uberon and CL terms

get.description:
Number of ASCTB-TEMP IDs in ASCT+B tables

```
#+ summary: ASCT+B TEMP IDs in HRA
#+ description: Number of ASCTB-TEMP IDs in ASCT+B tables

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type1 .
  OPTIONAL {
  	?iri ccf:ccf_biomarker_type ?bm_type . 
  }
  BIND(IF(BOUND(?bm_type), CONCAT("BM (", ?bm_type, ")"), STR(?asctb_type1)) AS ?asctb_type)
  FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?iri), STR(ASCTB-TEMP:)))
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY DESC(?count)
```

get.summary: All digital objects published to the HRA KG

get.description:
Reference Organ GLB information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ GLB information
#+ description: Reference Organ GLB information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT (STR(?refOrgan) as ?ref_organ) ?glb_url ?scene_node
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_object_reference [
  	ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node  
  ] .
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ

```

Reference Organ GLB information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ GLB information
#+ description: Reference Organ GLB information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref_organ_digital_object ?glb_url ?scene_node ?as_label ?as_iri  
FROM HRA:
WHERE {
  ?refOrganPart ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan ;
      ccf:representation_of ?as_iri .
  ?refOrganPart ccf:has_object_reference [
    ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node  
  ] .
  ?as_iri rdfs:label ?as_label .
  BIND(IRI(STRBEFORE(REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), "#primary", ""), '/v1.')) as ?ref_organ_digital_object)
  FILTER(!CONTAINS(STR(?refOrgan), '/ref-organ/united'))
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ_digital_object ?as_label

```

```
#+ summary: A list of unmapped AS, CT, and B terms in HRA

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT DISTINCT ?table ?asctb_type ?iri
WHERE {
  GRAPH ?table {
    ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type .
    FILTER(STRSTARTS(STR(?iri), STR(ASCTB-TEMP:)))
  }
  FILTER (STRSTARTS(STR(?table), 'https://purl.humanatlas.io/asct-b'))
}
ORDER BY ?table ?asctb_type ?iri

```
get.summary: A list of unmapped AS, CT, and B terms in HRA

#+ summary: Unmapped AS, CT, and B in HRA

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
PREFIX ASCTB-TEMP: <https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP_>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM HRA:

get.summary: Cell Summaries with Biomarker information by Dataset
All biomarkers seen in Atlas Datasets
All cell types seen in Atlas Datasets

get.description:
```
#+ summary: atlas cell type level mapping

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX CL: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX HRA: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra-api>
PREFIX HRApop: <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/hra-pop>

SELECT DISTINCT ?cell_label ?cell_id ?level_1_cell_id ?level_1_cell_label
FROM HRA:
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/cl>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/vocab/pcl>
WHERE {
  # Select cell types to map
  GRAPH HRApop: {
    [] ccf:has_cell_summary [
      ccf:has_cell_summary_row [
        ccf:cell_id ?cell_id ;
      ]
    ] .
    FILTER(!STRSTARTS(STR(?cell_id), 'https://purl.org/ccf/ASCTB-TEMP'))
  }
  ?cell_id rdfs:label ?cell_label .
  
  # Match to upper level cell types
  OPTIONAL {
    # https://github.com/obophenotype/cell-ontology/blob/master/src/templates/general_cell_types_upper_slim.csv
    VALUES (?l1_cell_id) {
      (CL:0000540) # neuron
      (CL:0000125) # glial cell
      (CL:0000066) # epithelial cell
      (CL:0000152) # exocrine cell
      (CL:0000057) # fibroblast
      (CL:0000235) # macrophage
      (CL:0000084) # T cell
      (CL:0000236) # B cell
      (CL:0000623) # natural killer cell
      (CL:0000451) # dendritic cell
      (CL:0000192) # smooth muscle cell
      (CL:0000746) # cardiac muscle cell
      (CL:0000188) # cardiac muscle cell
      (CL:0000163) # endocrine cell
      (CL:0000148) # melanocyte
      (CL:0009004) # retinal cell
      (CL:0000349) # extraembryonic cell
      (CL:0000081) # blood cell
      (CL:0000576) # monocyte
      (CL:0000039) # germ line cell
      (CL:0000136) # fat cell
      (CL:0000499) # stromal cell
      (CL:0001035) # bone cell
      (CL:0000034) # stem cell
    }
    ?cell_id (rdfs:subClassOf|rdf:type)* ?l1_cell_id .
    ?l1_cell_id rdfs:label ?l1_cell_label .
  }

  BIND(COALESCE(?l1_cell_id, CL:0000000) as ?level_1_cell_id)
  BIND(COALESCE(?l1_cell_label, 'unknown cell') as ?level_1_cell_label)
}
ORDER BY ?cell_id

```

get.summary: Cell Summaries with Biomarker information by Dataset

get.description:
Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

```
#+ summary: Ref Organ AS count
#+ description: Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT (SAMPLE(?organ) AS ?organName) (COUNT(?structure) AS ?asCount)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?structure ccf:has_reference_organ ?organ .
}
GROUP BY ?organ
ORDER BY ?organName

```

```
#+ summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT ?asctb_type (COUNT(DISTINCT(?iri)) as ?count)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?iri ccf:ccf_asctb_type ?asctb_type
}
GROUP BY ?asctb_type
ORDER BY ?asctb_type

```
get.summary: Unique AS, CT, and B in HRA

get.description:
Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

```
#+ summary: AS per Ref. Organ
#+ description: Number of Anatomical Structures per Reference Organ

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX UBERON: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_>
PREFIX FMA: <http://purl.org/sig/ont/fma/fma>

SELECT
  ?organ
  ?sex
  (COUNT(?structure) AS ?as_count)
  (SAMPLE(?uberon_id) as ?uberon_id)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?structure ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan rdfs:label ?organ ;
    ccf:representation_of ?organIri ;
    ccf:organ_owner_sex ?sex .

  BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?organIri), STR(UBERON:), 'UBERON:'), STR(FMA:), 'FMA:') as ?uberon_id)
}
GROUP BY ?organ ?sex
ORDER BY ?organ ?sex

```

Get tissue block (and rui location) annotations

```
#+ summary: Tissue Block Annotations
#+ description: Get tissue block (and rui location) annotations

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT ?block ?ruiLocation ?term
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/ds-graphs>
WHERE {
  ?block ccf:has_registration_location ?ruiLocation .
  ?ruiLocation ccf:collides_with ?term .
}

```

Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: cell types located in an anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccfo: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?cell_iri ccfo:ccf_located_in ?_location_iri .
  ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query

get.summary: cell types located in an anatomical structure

get.description:
all biomarkers characterizing cell types

```
#+ summary: all biomarkers characterizing cell types
#+ description: all biomarkers characterizing cell types

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>

SELECT DISTINCT ?biomarker_iri ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .

  # Find biomarkers that characterize the cell type
  ?cell_iri rdfs:subClassOf [
    owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
    owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
  ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
    owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?biomarker_iri
  ] .
}

```

all cell types located in all anatomical structures

```
#+ summary: all cell types located in all anatomical structures
#+ description: all cell types located in all anatomical structures

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccfo: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_iri ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?cell_iri ccfo:ccf_located_in ?as_iri .
  ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .
}

```
get.summary: all cell types located in all anatomical structures

get.description:
Landmarks by Organ

```
#+ summary: Landmarks by Organ
#+ description: Landmarks by Organ

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ ?landmark_set ?landmark
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?landmark_id ccf:has_extraction_set ?extraction_set .
  ?landmark_id rdfs:label ?landmark .
  ?extraction_set ccf:extraction_set_for ?reference_organ .
  ?extraction_set rdfs:label ?landmark_set .
  ?reference_organ ccf:representation_of ?organ_id .
  ?organ_id rdfs:label ?organ .
}
ORDER BY ?organ ?landmark_set

```

Enter a biomarker IRI, get back a list of cell type and organ IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: organs and cell types characterized by a given biomarker
#+ description: Enter a biomarker IRI, get back a list of cell type and organ IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - biomarker: http://identifiers.org/hgnc/1678

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>

SELECT ?organ_label ?ct_label ?bm_label ?organ ?ct ?bm
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  # Find reference organ's AS / Uberon Term
  ?ref_organ ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
  ?ref_organ ccf:representation_of ?organ .

  # Find cell types located in the organ
  ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?organ .  
  #?ct ccf:ccf_asctb_type 'CT' .
  
  # Find biomarkers that characterize the cell type
  ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
  	owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
  	owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
  ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
  	owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?_biomarker_iri ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
  ] .

  # Grab labels
  ?organ rdfs:label ?organ_label .
  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?bm rdfs:label ?bm_label .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_biomarker_iri in the original query
parameters.name: biomarker

get.summary: organs and cell types characterized by a given biomarker
all results for organs and cell types characterized by a given biomarker

get.description:
Enter a biomarker IRI, get back a list of cell type and organ IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: organs and cell types characterized by a given biomarker
#+ description: Enter a biomarker IRI, get back a list of cell type and organ IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - biomarker: http://identifiers.org/hgnc/1678

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ ?organ_label
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  # Find reference organ's AS / Uberon Term
  ?ref_organ ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
  ?ref_organ ccf:representation_of ?organ .

  # Find cell types located in the organ
  ?ct ccf:ccf_located_in ?representation_of .  
  #?ct ccf:ccf_asctb_type 'CT' .

  # Find biomarkers that characterize the cell type
  ?ct rdfs:subClassOf [
    owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
    owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
  ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
    owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?_biomarker_iri ;
    owl:someValuesFrom ?bm
  ] .

  # Grab labels
  ?organ rdfs:label ?organ_label .
  ?ct rdfs:label ?ct_label .
  ?bm rdfs:label ?bm_label .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_biomarker_iri in the original query
parameters.name: biomarker

get.summary: organs and cell types characterized by a given biomarker

get.description:
Reference Organ AS information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ AS information
#+ description: Reference Organ AS information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ccf-spo: <http://purl.org/ccf/latest/ccf.owl#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?as_iri ?ref_organ_iri ?ref_organ_term ?sex
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?as3d ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ_iri .
  ?as3d ccf:representation_of ?as_iri .
  ?ref_organ_iri ccf:representation_of ?ref_organ_term .
  ?ref_organ_iri ccf:organ_owner_sex ?sex .
}

```

Reference Organ GLB information

```
#+ summary: Reference Organ GLB information
#+ description: Reference Organ GLB information

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ccf-spo: <http://purl.org/ccf/latest/ccf.owl#>

SELECT DISTINCT (STR(?refOrgan) as ?ref_organ) ?glb_url ?scene_node
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?n ccf:placement_for ?refOrgan .
  ?n ccf:placement_relative_to ?target .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_object_reference [
  	ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node  
  ] .
  FILTER ( ?target = ccf-spo:VHFemale || ?target = ccf-spo:VHMale ) 
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ

```

Returns the sex for each reference organ (minus version string)

```
#+ summary: Ref Organ => Sex
#+ description: Returns the sex for each reference organ (minus version string)

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?reference_organ ?sex
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?refOrgan a ccf:SpatialEntity .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:organ_owner_sex ?sex .
  BIND (REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), "V1.1", ""), "V1.2", "") as ?reference_organ)
}

```

Returns the reference organ (minus version string) associated with each rui location

```
#+ summary: RUI Location => Ref Organ
#+ description: Returns the reference organ (minus version string) associated with each rui location

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT (STR(?ruiLocation) as ?rui_location) ?reference_organ
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/ds-graphs>
WHERE {
  ?placement ccf:placement_for ?ruiLocation .
  ?placement ccf:placement_relative_to ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:has_reference_organ ?refOrgan .
  BIND (REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?refOrgan), "V1.1", ""), "V1.2", "") as ?reference_organ)
}

```

Get Tissue Blocks that have a Donor sex different from the Reference Organ sex

```
#+ summary: Sex Mismatches
#+ description: Get Tissue Blocks that have a Donor sex different from the Reference Organ sex

PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT ?block ?ruiLocation ?refOrgan ?donorSex ?refOrganSex
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/ds-graphs>
WHERE {
  # Find donor sex
  ?block ccf:comes_from [
      ccf:sex ?donorSex
  ] .
  
  # Find reference organ sex associated with the block's rui_location 
  ?block ccf:has_registration_location ?ruiLocation .
  [] ccf:placement_for ?ruiLocation ;
    ccf:placement_relative_to ?refOrgan .
  ?refOrgan ccf:organ_owner_sex ?refOrganSex .

  FILTER ( STR(?donorSex) != STR(?refOrganSex) )
}

```

Enter an biomarker IRI, get back a list of anatomical structure and cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: anatomical structures and cell types associated with a given biomarker
#+ description: Enter an biomarker IRI, get back a list of anatomical structure and cell type IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - biomarker: http://identifiers.org/hgnc/1653

PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX has_characterizing_biomarker_set: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0015004>

SELECT DISTINCT ?location_iri ?location_label ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
WHERE {
  ?location_iri ^ccf:ccf_part_of* ?child . 
  ?cell_iri ccf:ccf_located_in ?child .
  ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .
  ?location_iri rdfs:label ?location_label .
  
  # Find biomarkers that characterize the cell type
  ?cell_iri rdfs:subClassOf [
    owl:onProperty has_characterizing_biomarker_set: ;
    owl:someValuesFrom [ owl:intersectionOf ?bn3 ]] .
    ?bn3 rdf:rest*/rdf:first [
      owl:onProperty ccf:has_marker_component ;
      owl:someValuesFrom ?_biomarker_iri
    ] .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_biomarker_iri in the original query
parameters.name: biomarker

get.summary: anatomical structures and cell types associated with a given biomarker

get.description:
Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: cell types located in an anatomical structure
#+ description: Enter an anatomical structure IRI, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/collection/hra>
WHERE {
  ?_location_iri ^ccf:ccf_part_of* ?child . 
  ?cell_iri ccf:ccf_located_in ?child .
  ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.summary: cell types located in an anatomical structure

get.description:
Count of 3D Anatomical Structures by release

```
#+ summary: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures by release
#+ description: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures by release

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT ?release (SAMPLE(?organ) AS ?organName) (COUNT(?structure) AS ?asCount)
WHERE {
  GRAPH ?release {
    ?structure ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
  }
  BIND (REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?ref_organ), "http://purl.org/ccf/latest/ccf.owl#", ""), "V1.1", ""), "V1.2", ""), "V1.0", "") as ?organ)
  FILTER (STRSTARTS(STR(?release), "https://purl.org/ccf/releases/"))
}
GROUP BY ?release ?organ
ORDER BY DESC(?release) DESC(?asCount)

```
get.summary: Count of 3D Anatomical Structures by release

get.description:
```
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccfo: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?parent_as ?child_as ?parent_label ?child_label
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?child_as ccfo:ccf_part_of* ?parent_as .
  ?parent_as rdfs:label ?parent_label .
  ?child_as rdfs:label ?child_label .
  VALUES ?parent_as { <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113> }
}

```

Get Reference Organ GLB scene nodes and associated ontology terms

```
#+ summary: Get glb nodes and terms
#+ description: Get Reference Organ GLB scene nodes and associated ontology terms

PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?ref_organ ?glb_url ?scene_node ?node_id ?node_iri ?node_label
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
WHERE {
  ?ref_organ_node ccf:has_object_reference [
  	ccf:file_url ?glb_url ;
    ccf:file_subpath ?scene_node ;
  ] .

  ?ref_organ_node ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
  ?ref_organ_node ccf:representation_of ?node_iri .
  ?node_iri rdfs:label ?node_label .

  BIND(REPLACE(REPLACE(STR(?node_iri), "http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_", "UBERON:"), "http://purl.org/sig/ont/fma/fma", "FMA:") as ?node_id)
}
ORDER BY ?ref_organ ?node_id

```

```
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ctpop: <https://cns-iu.github.io/hra-cell-type-populations-supporting-information/data/enriched_rui_locations.jsonld#graph>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ ?organ_label ?dataset ?summary ?cell_annotation_method ?cell_id ?cell_label ?count ?percentage
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
FROM ctpop:
WHERE {
  # List of query organ iris
  VALUES ?organ { <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113> }

  # Get all AS part of ?organ
  {
    ?child_as ccf:ccf_part_of* ?organ .
    ?organ rdfs:label ?organ_label .
    ?child_as rdfs:label ?child_label .
  }
  UNION
  { # Make ?organ selectable as well
    BIND(?organ as ?child_as)
  }

  # Get ?ref_organ that represent something part of ?organ
  {
    ?ref_organ ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
    ?ref_organ ccf:representation_of ?child_as .
  }

  # Get ?datasets placed relative to ?ref_organ
  {
    ?rui_location a ccf:SpatialEntity .
    ?dataset a ccf:Dataset .
    ?sample ccf:generates_dataset ?dataset .
    ?sample ccf:has_registration_location ?rui_location .

    ?placement ccf:placement_for ?rui_location .
    ?placement ccf:placement_relative_to ?ref_organ .
  }

  # Get cell summaries attached to ?datasets
  {
    SELECT * WHERE {
      ?dataset ccf:has_cell_summary ?summary .
      ?summary ccf:cell_annotation_method ?cell_annotation_method .
      ?summary ccf:has_cell_summary_row ?row .

      ?row ccf:cell_id ?cell_id .
      ?row ccf:cell_label ?cell_label .
      ?row ccf:cell_count ?count .
      ?row ccf:percentage_of_total ?percentage .
    }
  }
}
ORDER BY ?organ ?dataset ?summary

```

```
PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX ccf: <http://purl.org/ccf/>
PREFIX ctpop: <https://cns-iu.github.io/hra-cell-type-populations-supporting-information/data/enriched_rui_locations.jsonld#graph>

SELECT DISTINCT ?organ ?organ_label ?dataset ?label ?link ?description
FROM <https://purl.humanatlas.io/graph/ccf>
FROM ctpop:
WHERE {
  # List of query organ iris
  VALUES ?organ { <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113> }

  # Get all AS part of ?organ
  {
    ?child_as ccf:ccf_part_of* ?organ .
    ?organ rdfs:label ?organ_label .
    ?child_as rdfs:label ?child_label .
  }
  UNION
  { # Make ?organ selectable as well
    BIND(?organ as ?child_as)
  }

  # Get ?ref_organ that represent something part of ?organ
  {
    ?ref_organ ccf:has_reference_organ ?ref_organ .
    ?ref_organ ccf:representation_of ?child_as .
  }

  # Get metadata about ?datasets placed relative to ?ref_organ
  {
    ?rui_location a ccf:SpatialEntity .
    ?dataset a ccf:Dataset .
    ?sample ccf:generates_dataset ?dataset .
    ?sample ccf:has_registration_location ?rui_location .

    ?placement ccf:placement_for ?rui_location .
    ?placement ccf:placement_relative_to ?ref_organ .

    ?dataset rdfs:label ?label .
    ?dataset ccf:url ?link .
    ?dataset rdfs:comment ?description .
  }
}

```

Enter an anatomical location, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: Find cells by location
#+ description: Enter an anatomical location, get back a list of cell type IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - location: http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0002113

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cell: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_0000000>

SELECT DISTINCT ?cell_iri (STR(?qlabel) as ?cell_label)
WHERE {
   ?cell_iri overlaps: ?_location_iri .
   ?cell_iri rdfs:subClassOf cell: .
   ?cell_iri rdfs:label ?qlabel .
  }



```

parameters.description: A value of type string (iri) that will substitute ?_location_iri in the original query
parameters.name: location

get.description:
Get back a list of cell types and parent cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: Find cell parent classes
#+ description: Get back a list of cell types and parent cell type IRIs and labels


PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cell: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_0000000>

SELECT DISTINCT ?cell ?cell_label ?parent_cell ?parent_label
WHERE { 
    ?cell rdfs:label ?cell_label .
    ?cell rdfs:subClassOf cell: .
    ?cell rdfs:subClassOf ?parent_cell .
    ?parent_cell rdfs:subClassOf cell: .
    ?parent_cell rdfs:label ?parent_label .
}

```

Enter a cell type rdfs label, get back a list of parent cell type IRIs and labels

```
#+ summary: Find cell parent classes by label
#+ description: Enter a cell type rdfs label, get back a list of parent cell type IRIs and labels

#+ defaults:
#+   - label: "mature B cell"

PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
PREFIX owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
PREFIX overlaps: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/RO_0002131>
PREFIX cell: <http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/CL_0000000>

SELECT *
WHERE {
  {
    {
      SELECT DISTINCT ?cell ?cell_label ?parent_cell ?parent_label
      WHERE { 
        ?cell rdfs:label ?cell_label .
        ?cell rdfs:subClassOf cell: .
        ?cell rdfs:subClassOf ?parent_cell .
        ?parent_cell rdfs:subClassOf cell: .
        ?parent_cell rdfs:label ?parent_label .
      }
    }
  }
  FILTER( STR(?cell_label) = ?_label ) .
}

```

parameters.description: A value of type string that will substitute ?_label in the original query
parameters.name: label

get.summary: Find cell parent classes by label
